text: Dazaifu (太宰府市, Dazaifu-shi) is a city in the Japanese prefecture of Fukuoka. It has a population of 67,428. The city was founded on April 1, 1982, but it has been historically important for around a thousand years. == Sister cities == * Tagajō (Miyagi Prefecture) - 21 November 2005 * Nara (Nara Prefecture) - 27 June 2002 * Yabakei (Ōita Prefecture) - 26 September 1992 * Buyeo, South Chungcheong Province (South Korea) - 21 April 1978 ==Education== There are several universities in the city: *Chikushi Jogakuen University *Fukuoka International University *Japan University of Economics *Fukuoka Social Medical Welfare University Category:Cities in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Dazaifu, Fukuoka
